name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.scheduler.heartbeat.interval-ms
description:
The interval in ms at which the MR AppMaster should send
    heartbeats to the ResourceManager

name: dfs.stream-buffer-size
description:
The size of buffer to stream files.
  The size of this buffer should probably be a multiple of hardware
  page size (4096 on Intel x86), and it determines how much data is
  buffered during read and write operations.

name: dfs.edit.log.transfer.bandwidthPerSec
description:
Maximum bandwidth used for transferring edit log to between journal nodes
    for syncing, in bytes per second.
    A default value of 0 indicates that throttling is disabled.

name: dfs.disk.balancer.max.disk.throughputInMBperSec
description:
Maximum disk bandwidth used by diskbalancer
      during read from a source disk. The unit is MB/sec.

name: hadoop.shell.safely.delete.limit.num.files
description:
Used by -safely option of hadoop fs shell -rm command to avoid
      accidental deletion of large directories. When enabled, the -rm command
      requires confirmation if the number of files to be deleted is greater than
      this limit.  The default limit is 100 files. The warning is disabled if
      the limit is 0 or the -safely is not specified in -rm command.

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.probe.deadnode.interval.ms
description: Interval time in milliseconds for probing dead node behavior.
